title: BoardUpdate — Northstar / Riverbend — Marketing — 2025-06-16
all_text:
BOARD UPDATE — POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF RIVERBEND (INTERNAL)
Date: 2025-06-16
Stage: Marketing

Highlights:
- Deal thesis: expand into sensor + edge footprint to accelerate Northstar’s industrial
analytics growth.
- Status: slightly delayed; key diligence workstreams active.
- Economics: pricing within modeled range; earn-out under discussion.

Key risks:
- Security note: one phishing incident last year; remediation appears adequate but evidence
is partial.

Next steps:
- Finalize definitive agreement draft
- Confirm financing terms with HarborGate Bank
- Prepare Day-1 communications plan
